dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1790 IH: Golden Age Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gill of Texas (for himself, Mr. Nehls, and Ms. Boebert) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require $100 notes to include a portrait of Donald J. Trump, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Golden Age Act of 2025.

section.header: Donald J. Trump on the $100 note

subsection.text: Section 5114(b) of title 31, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following: Notwithstanding the previous sentence, no $100 note of the United States currency may be printed after December 31, 2028, which does not prominently feature a portrait of Donald J. Trump on the front face of the note
The Secretary of Treasury shall release to the public the preliminary design of the $100 note prominently featuring a portrait of Donald J. Trump not later than December 31, 2026.
